titles: To the right honourable the Commons in Parliament assembled, the humble petition of Sir John Lenthal, Knight
author: Lenthall, John, Sir, 1625-1681.
notes: Second petition on sheet has title: To the right honourable the knights, citizens and burgesses of the House of Commons now assembled in Parliament, the case and humble petition of Sir John Lenthal, Knight, on the creditors of Sir Peter Temple, Knight and Baronet, deceased.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Library.
keywords: Temple, Peter, --  Sir, 1592-1653 --  Trials, litigation, etc.
